widgets_values:
## Play with parameters
---
### - Here for example I increased temperature and decreased speed, to compensate Clint naturally speaking too fast.
### - Increased target_rms, to supposedly get a better quality (I can't hear any difference, so, who knows...)
### - Separating sentences or just feeding all in one big paragraph seams to make a difference in how it sounds, but surprisingly the total time is always the same.

1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:06,000
Smart natural... intelligently adjusts timings

2
00:00:06,000 --> 00:00:11,200
within the timing tolerance setting,

3
00:00:11,200 --> 00:00:15,800
prioritizing natural audio and shifting later segments.

4
00:00:15,800 --> 00:00:21,500
It applies stretch or shrink within the limits

5
00:00:21,500 --> 00:00:26,000
set by the minimum and maximum stretch ratio.

6
00:00:26,000 --> 00:00:31,000
This would be the perfect, most natural option...

7
00:00:31,000 --> 00:00:35,000
if stretching didnâ€™t hurt the audio quality so much...

8
00:00:35,000 --> 00:00:40,000
Oh! But it's not a problem anymore now that we are using FFmpeg!

9
00:00:40,000 --> 00:00:48,000
Try changing limiting the max stretch ratio option to 1.0 to make it more natural!

1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:04,500
Stretch to fit... stretches or compresses audio

2
00:00:04,500 --> 00:00:10,000
to exactly match the SRT segment durations.

3
00:00:10,000 --> 00:00:15,000
It will always stretch to reach the start and end.

4
00:00:15,000 --> 00:00:22,000
If audio quality werenâ€™t so bad when stretching, this could be a very natural-sounding option.

5
00:00:23,000 --> 00:00:28,000
Oh! But it's not a problem anymore now that we are using FFmpeg!!

1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:04,300
Pad with silence... places natural audio

2
00:00:04,300 --> 00:00:09,500
with no stretching at all at the SRT start times,

3
00:00:09,500 --> 00:00:14,200
padding any gaps with silence.

4
00:00:14,200 --> 00:00:20,000
The problem is, if the generated audio is too long, it may result in overlaps.

1
00:00:01,000 --> 00:00:04,000
Hello! This is unified SRT TTS with character switching.

2
00:00:04,500 --> 00:00:09,500
[Alice] Hi there! I'm Alice speaking with precise timing.

3
00:00:10,000 --> 00:00:14,000
[Bob] And I'm Bob! The audio matches these exact SRT timings.

3
00:00:07,000 --> 00:00:10,500

Es bietet hochwertige Stimmklonierung mit Referenz-Audiobeispielen.

5
00:00:14,000 --> 00:00:17,500
Unsere Implementierung unterstÃ¼tzt mehrere Sprachen, darunter Englisch und Deutsch.

6
00:00:17,500 --> 00:00:21,000
Der Audio Wave Analyzer bietet eine interaktive Visualisierung der Wellenform.

7
00:00:21,000 --> 00:00:24,500
Sie kÃ¶nnen prÃ¤zise Timing-Informationen fÃ¼r Speech-Editing-Workflows extrahieren.

8
00:00:24,500 --> 00:00:28,000
Dieses Projekt erweitert die ursprÃ¼nglichen ChatterBox-Nodes von ShmuelRonen.

9
00:00:28,000 --> 00:00:31,500
Wir haben eine SRT-Untertitelverarbeitung mit intelligenten Timing-Modi hinzugefÃ¼gt.

10
00:00:31,500 --> 00:00:35,000
Das smarte natÃ¼rliche Timing verhindert Ãœberschneidungen und gewÃ¤hrleistet einen natÃ¼rlichen Fluss.

11
00:00:35,000 --> 00:00:38,500
Segment-Level-Caching regeneriert nur geÃ¤nderte Teile zur Effizienzsteigerung.

12
00:00:38,500 --> 00:00:42,000
F5-TTS-Modelle unterstÃ¼tzen auch Spanisch, FranzÃ¶sisch und Japanisch.

13
00:00:42,000 --> 00:00:45,500
Stimmreferenzen kÃ¶nnen einfach mit unserem dedizierten Ordnersystem verwaltet werden.

14
00:00:45,500 --> 00:00:49,000
Platzieren Sie einfach Ihre WAV-Dateien mit passenden Transkriptionstextdateien.

15
00:00:49,000 --> 00:00:52,500

16
00:00:52,500 --> 00:00:56,000
Erweitertes Chunking zerlegt lange Texte in Ã¼berschaubare Satzsegmente.

17
00:00:56,000 --> 00:00:59,500
Mehrere Kombinationsmethoden umfassen Ãœberblendung und Stille-Padding.

18
00:00:59,500 --> 00:01:03,000
ComfyUI-Workflows kÃ¶nnen heruntergeladen und direkt in die OberflÃ¤che gezogen werden.

19
00:01:03,000 --> 00:01:06,500
Der Audio Wave Analyzer-Workflow ermÃ¶glicht prÃ¤zises F5-TTS Speech Editing.

20
00:01:06,500 --> 00:01:10,000
Diese umfassende LÃ¶sung bringt professionelle **TTS**-Funktionen zu **Comfy UI**.

21
00:01:10,000 --> 00:01:13,500
Stimmkonvertierung transformiert die Stimme eines Sprechers in den Stil eines anderen.

22
00:01:13,500 --> 00:01:17,000
Smarte Stille-Erkennung erfasst Spracheingaben mit konfigurierbaren Schwellenwerten.

23
00:01:17,000 --> 00:01:20,500
Temperatur- und CFG-Einstellungen steuern die Stimmvariation und die StÃ¤rke der FÃ¼hrung.

24
00:01:20,500 --> 00:01:24,000
Das Projekt behÃ¤lt die AbwÃ¤rtskompatibilitÃ¤t mit bestehenden Workflows bei.

25
00:01:24,000 --> 00:01:27,500
Die Installation ist unkompliziert mit pip-Anforderungen und Modell-Downloads.

26
00:01:27,500 --> 00:01:31,000
Vielen Dank, dass Sie **ComfyUI ChatterBox Voice** mit **F5-TTS**-Integration erkundet haben.

nodes.title: ðŸŽ¤ F5-TTS Voice Generation German test

widgets_values:
1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:03,500
Welcome to ComfyUI ChatterBox Voice, the ultimate text-to-speech solution.

2
00:00:03,500 --> 00:00:07,000
This project integrates F5-TTS technology with ComfyUI workflows.

3
00:00:07,000 --> 00:00:10,500
F5-TTS: A Fairytaler that Fakes Fluent and Faithful Speech with Flow Matching.

4
00:00:10,500 --> 00:00:14,000
It provides high-quality voice cloning with reference audio samples.

5
00:00:14,000 --> 00:00:17,500
Our implementation supports multiple languages including English and German.

6
00:00:17,500 --> 00:00:21,000
The Audio Wave Analyzer provides interactive waveform visualization.

7
00:00:21,000 --> 00:00:24,500
You can extract precise timing information for speech editing workflows.

8
00:00:24,500 --> 00:00:28,000
This project extends the original ChatterBox nodes by ShmuelRonen.

9
00:00:28,000 --> 00:00:31,500
We've added SRT subtitle processing with intelligent timing modes.

10
00:00:31,500 --> 00:00:35,000
The smart natural timing prevents overlaps and ensures natural flow.

11
00:00:35,000 --> 00:00:38,500
Segment-level caching only regenerates modified parts for efficiency.

12
00:00:38,500 --> 00:00:42,000
F5-TTS models support Spanish, French, and Japanese languages too.

13
00:00:42,000 --> 00:00:45,500
Voice references can be managed easily with our dedicated folder system.

14
00:00:45,500 --> 00:00:49,000
Simply place your WAV files with matching transcription text files.

15
00:00:49,000 --> 00:00:52,500
The system auto-detects voice references from dropdown selections.

16
00:00:52,500 --> 00:00:56,000
Enhanced chunking breaks long texts into manageable sentence segments.

17
00:00:56,000 --> 00:00:59,500
Multiple combination methods include crossfade and silence padding.

18
00:00:59,500 --> 00:01:03,000
ComfyUI workflows can be downloaded and dragged directly into the interface.

19
00:01:03,000 --> 00:01:06,500
The Audio Wave Analyzer workflow enables precise F5-TTS speech editing.

20
00:01:06,500 --> 00:01:10,000
This comprehensive solution brings professional TTS capabilities to ComfyUI.

21
00:01:10,000 --> 00:01:13,500
Voice conversion transforms one speaker's voice into another's style.

22
00:01:13,500 --> 00:01:17,000
Smart silence detection captures voice input with configurable thresholds.

23
00:01:17,000 --> 00:01:20,500
Temperature and CFG settings control voice variation and guidance strength.

24
00:01:20,500 --> 00:01:24,000
The project maintains backward compatibility with existing workflows.

25
00:01:24,000 --> 00:01:27,500
Installation is straightforward with pip requirements and model downloads.

26
00:01:27,500 --> 00:01:31,000
Thank you for exploring ComfyUI ChatterBox Voice with F5-TTS integration.

1
00:00:01,000 --> 00:00:04,000
Hello! This is unified SRT TTS with character switching.

2
00:00:04,500 --> 00:00:09,500
[Alice] Hi there! I'm Alice speaking with precise timing.

3
00:00:10,000 --> 00:00:14,000
[Bob] And I'm Bob! The audio matches these exact SRT timings.

4
00:00:14,000 --> 00:00:20,000
Have fun! Greetings from Ziggy and Murph - Bye.

1
00:00:01,000 --> 00:00:04,000
Hello! This is unified SRT TTS with character switching.

2
00:00:04,500 --> 00:00:09,500
[Alice] Hi there! I'm Alice speaking with precise timing.

3
00:00:10,000 --> 00:00:14,000
[Bob] And I'm Bob! The audio matches these exact SRT timings.

4
00:00:14,000 --> 00:00:20,000
Have fun! Greetings from Ziggy and Murph.

## Play with parameters
---
### - You can notice that F5 is way more sensitive than Chatterbox
### - Chatterbox have an `exaggeration` slider, F5 does not.
### - You should watch out for any exclamation point "!"

Murph_ðŸŽ¤ ðŸ“º F5-TTS SRT and Normal Generation V1.0
Test August 2025
